relation: Great for these types of students
It is always very calm and safe!
The dorm life is calm, but the girls tend to find out of campus parties.
It really all depends of the student, if you pay attention in class you will do fine.
Take advantage of all the scholarships that are offered there!!
Mount Mary University is full of opportunities! The learning experience one receives there is one of a kind. I couldn't have found a better University.

textAfterTable: Food and Dining The food is always fresh and there is always a excellent variety on a daily basis. Parkway Grill and two Starbucks have just been added! Dorm Life There are frequent actitivities for the residents to participate in. For example, movie nights, cocoa moca Tuesdays, grocery bingo, etc. Academic Rigor You will always take prerequisites before just being put into a class. This school will always make sure that you're prepared for what's to come. If you're having a hard time, they offered FREE tutoring services! Tips for prospective students Be prepared to endure one of the greatest learning communities that you will ever step foot in! In three sentences This is an excellent choice for female students who enjoy having a close knit community. The class sizes are excellent. The faculty and staff are extremely caring. Login to rate or flag the reviews Monica from Milwaukee, WI 07/10/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5
